name: Fragments (itch) (Bryce Sandall)
description:
In your final moments, explore the fragments of your life and find peace in the pieces. 

This is a short narrative experience where you play as an old man exploring his memories before he fades away. 

*Note: This is a prototype/proof of concept :)

Credits:

Once you have the game downloaded, make sure to extract the file in a location of your choosing and run the Fragments.exe file.
